metadata.title: CVE-2023-5997 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Garbage Collection in Google Chrome prior to119.0.6045.159 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
